member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.V3Client.IODataV3ClientFactory
member.summary: A factory abstraction for a component that can create instances with custom configuration for a given logical name.
member.remarks: A default can be registered in an IServiceCollection/> by calling ODataClientFactoryExtensions.AddODataV3Client(IServiceCollection)"/>. The default will be registered in the service collection as a singleton.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.V3Client.IODataV3ClientFactory.CreateClient``1(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and configures an instance using the configuration that corresponds to the logical name specified by with the specified
member.typeparam: The concrate type generated by the OData Client code generatator.
member.param: An absolute URI that identifies the root of a data service.
The logical name of the client to create. the same logic name will be used to create underlying instance for communication.

remarks.para: Each call to is guaranteed to return a new instance. Callers may cache the returned instance indefinitely or surround its use in a using block to dispose it when desired.
Callers are also free to mutate the returned instance's public properties as desired.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.V3Client.IODataV3ClientHandler
member.summary: A single handler that can alter the behavior of odata client

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.OData.V3Client.IODataV3ClientHandler.OnClientCreated(Microsoft.Extensions.OData.V3Client.ClientCreatedArgs)
member.summary: Called after IODataProxyFactory{T}.CreateProxy(string, string) If multiple handlers are registered, then they are called in reverse order of registration.
